com.communote.server.core.external

Interface ExternalUserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Orderable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExternalUserRepository, ConfluenceUserRepository, LdapUserRepository

    public interface ExternalUserRepository
extends Orderable
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • createConfiguration

        ExternalSystemConfiguration createConfiguration()
        Create an empty configuration. E.g. to access the configuration url and name if no configuration exists.
        Returns:
        the empty configuration

      • getConfiguration

        ExternalSystemConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Gets the external system configuration
        Returns:
        ExternalSystemConfiguration set, is null if not configured

      • getExternalLoginProperties

        Collection<StringPropertyTO> getExternalLoginProperties(Long userId,
                                                        ExternalUserAuthentication externalUserAuthentication)
                                                 throws AuthorizationException
        External Repos can return additional properties that will be included e.g. in the rest resource
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user the authentication is for
        externalUserAuthentication - the authentication to get additional properties for
        Returns:
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • getExternalSystemId

        String getExternalSystemId()
        Get the external system identifier.
        Returns:
        external system identifier

      • getExternalUserGroupAccessor

        ExternalUserGroupAccessor getExternalUserGroupAccessor()
        Get the external user group accessor if user repository is also an group repository
        Returns:
        the external user group accessor or null if repository is not an group repository.

      • getIncrementalRepositoryChangeTracker

        IncrementalRepositoryChangeTracker getIncrementalRepositoryChangeTracker(boolean doFullSynchronization)
        Method to get an tracker for changes within an external repository. This method should only return an object, if the incremental changes are possible and enabled.
        Parameters:
        doFullSynchronization - If set to true, a full synchronization should be done.
        Returns:
        A tracker, if incremental synchronization is possible and enabled, else false.

      • getName

        LocalizedMessage getName()
        Returns:
        a user friendly name of the repository

      • getProvidedProfileFieldNames

        Set<UserProfileFields> getProvidedProfileFieldNames()
        Returns:
        the names of the user profile fields this user repository provides for all its users. If no fields are provided an empty set has to be returned.

      • getUser

        ExternalUserVO getUser(String externalUserId)
                throws ExternalRepositoryException
        Get the ExternalUserVO of the external user identifier
        Parameters:
        externalUserId - external user identifier
        Returns:
        ExternalUserVO
        Throws:
        ExternalRepositoryException - repository exception

      • getUser

        ExternalUserVO getUser(UserIdentification userIdentification)
                throws ExternalRepositoryException
        Get the ExternalUserVO for the UserIdentification. The UserIdentification provides information about internal id, external id and so on. The external user repo implementation of this method must considered the following:
        the internal id or alias have not been evaluated so far if the external system id is set or a primary id is given the external system id of the user identification does not have to match the system id of this repo, e.g. if a primary repo is given
        Parameters:
        userIdentification - UserIdentification
        Returns:
        ExternalUserVO
        Throws:
        ExternalRepositoryException - repository exception

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Check if external repo is active and can be used
        Returns:
        true or false

      • isIncrementalSynchronizationAvailable

        boolean isIncrementalSynchronizationAvailable()
        Returns:
        True, if incremental synchronization is available, else false.

      • showInIntegrationOverview

        boolean showInIntegrationOverview()
        Returns:
        True to show the repo in the Integration overview.
